kesako.utilities

Class LoadJarFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.utilities.LoadJarFile

  • public class LoadJarFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Useful class for dynamically loading jar file during runtime.
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT
